HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Zásilkovna domů: 89 Kč. Česká pošta (balík do ruky): 139 Kč. DPD: 99 Kč. PPL: 89 Kč. Kurýr (Trutnov): 200 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Zdarma pro objednávky nad 4 999 Kč nebo 14 989 Kč v závislosti na dopravci.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Druhý den po odeslání. Kurýr Trutnov možná i v den objednávky.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna (výdejní místa): 79 Kč. Česká pošta (Balíkovna): 89 Kč. Česká pošta (balík na poštu): 139 Kč. DPD (výdejní místa): 79 Kč.
PARCEL_SHOPS.free_delivery_limit: Zdarma pro objednávky nad 4 999 Kč nebo 14 989 Kč v závislosti na dopravci.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, Parcel Shops, and In-store pickup are available.
PROVIDERS: Zásilkovna, Česká pošta, DPD, PPL, and a local courier for Trutnov.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs range from 79 Kč to 139 Kč. Free shipping is offered, but the threshold is inconsistently stated as either over 4,999 Kč or over 14,989 Kč depending on the service and the section of the page. COD surcharge is 25 Kč, but free for Balíkovna pickup.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Same-day local courier delivery is available in Trutnov for 200 Kč. In-store pickup is free in Trutnov.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is generally comprehensive but contains significant contradictions regarding pricing and free shipping thresholds between the summary table and detailed descriptions, which could confuse customers. There is no information about parcel lockers, bulky item shipping, or weekend delivery.
